text: Source Definition Examples Stationary: Emissions of 10 tons per year or more of any one air toxic, or 25 tons per year or more of any combination of air toxics Major Utilities, refineries, steel manufacturers, chemical manufacturers Emissions of less than 10 tons per Dry cleaners, gas stations, year of any one air toxic pollutant, auto body refinishing paint or less than 25 tons per year of any combination of air toxics Area shops, decorative chromium electroplating operations Mobile: Emissions from motorized vehicles Cars, buses, sport-utility normally operated on public roadways On-road vehicles, light- and heavy- duty trucks Construction and agricultural equipment, personal watercraft, lawn and garden equipment Non-road Emissions from a diverse collection of engines, equipment, vehicles, and vessels operated off public roads Source: OIG
